title: One Show host angers viewers as she 'rudely' interrupts Emma Willis | Metro News
text:
Hannah Lawrence for Metro.co.uk Saturday 18 Feb 2017 9:26 am Emma Willis couldn’t hide her shock after being interrupted mid-story on the One Show (Picture: BBC) 
Fans were not happy with One Show host Angela Scanlon after she interrupted Emma Willis during a story about her grandad on Friday’s show. Sponsored 13 realities of going wedding dress shopping 
The 40-year-old The Voice presenter was appearing on the show ahead of her big role hosting the Brit Awards next week, but the television presenter found herself abruptly cut off as she began an explanation of her favourite sweet. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
The awkward interchange took place after host Ore Oduba asked the Brits host what her favourite sweet was. 
Willis began answering by saying: ‘One of my favourites – because my grandad always had them in his house and I would literally eat the whole bowl…’ Angela Scanlon was not popular on Twitter after interrupting Emma Willis (Picture: BBC) 
Before Scanlon cut her off by saying: ‘We’ll come back to that, first we’re going to talk about a little bit of butterscotch because they’re about to celebrate a very big birthday and Ricky has been to sample to city’s sweet claim to fame.’ 
Oduba tried to rescue the moment by joking with Willis: ‘You tease you.’ 
But viewers were quick to take to Twitter to express their outrage: @EmmaWillis hi Emma watched the one show ton I. Was mad that you was talking about your grandad and got cut I thought very rude xxx 
— Stephen hoad (@hoad007) February 17, 2017 How rude is this woman presenting the #oneshow ?! Don't interrupt the wonderful woman that is @EmmaWillis 
— Alice Pope (@Alice_Pope) February 17, 2017 Erm, wasn't Emma Willis mid-flow then? Strange #theoneshow
